Adequate nutrition is essential for maintaining optimal body function, preventing chronic diseases, and supporting mental well-being. A balanced diet, comprising macronutrients (carbohydrates, proteins, fats), micronutrients (vitamins and minerals), and water, is crucial for overall health. Poor nutrition, including under- and over-nutrition, can lead to various health issues, such as malnutrition, obesity, and related diseases.
